lines: Wĩigue ũhoe, Rĩrĩa wĩ na ihinda, Ihinda ti inene, ũkĩra wĩhũge,
Mwĩri ndũrĩ hinya, Thũ iitũ nĩ njamba
Jesũ nĩeiguire, Agĩkũhoera, Athithinire thakame no ũndũ waku
ĩtĩkĩra Jesũ, Nowe hinya waku, Wĩyohe mathaita, Thũ ndĩrĩ kũraya
Rĩu hena hingo, Tiga gũte ihinda, Ndũkagonderere, ũkĩra wĩhũũge.
